评论概述: Super convenient lanyard to have for a fast-paced teen on the move!
评论详情: Easy access to everything you need on the go!

I love this! It’s light weight, and full of options. There’s a zippered part for coins, and both sides hold cards. The key chain part is super durable and heavy duty. The quality of this purse is top notch.

This sleek, slim, and attractive wallet holds the essentials and is perfect when you're looking for something minimal to use instead of a full-size wallet or purse--when you're going out for the evening with a small bag or even no bag, heading to the gym, traveling, etc.  Room for cards, cash, change, ID, and even a key ring.  The quality seems nice but it does not appear to be leather as advertised.  Nonetheless, I really like it a lot and highly recommend--a great value!

I ordered this for the wife for when she doesn't want to carry a bigger clutch of wallet, just for basics.  The finish is faux leather, so she doesn't have to freak out if it starts wearing out. The finish and construction are decent. This is not a designer card wallet type of item, but more for when going hiking or to the gym when she doesn't have to carry everything.  She is happy with it, so that's all it matters.  The price point is fair considering what it is.

This is a very small card case, just right for a very small purse. There's a keychain loop at one end that you can use to fasten this case to a lanyard or use it to hold your keys. It does not open; the center is a zippered change-type compartment. There are 4 card slots and a lengthwise pocket on one side and two pockets on the other side that are slanted. The slant makes for a nice design element, but I'm not sure you want to trust it to hold an important card. Perfect for 5-6 business cards or similar. The hot pink color is nice.
This is a fantastic keychain wallet does everything you needed to do holds lots of different items to keep them protected and handy overall very happy with it

Really like this wallet; it's exactly what I was looking for. The key ring is pretty sturdy and seems to have good retention. The inside has a pretty big area to hold cash or extra cards. The card area is stuff upon the first couple uses, but does become easier to remove cards with use. The only part I don't like are the front card holders. They're so much larger than a normal card that I'm very fearful of losing my ID or credit card. My ID has fallen out and lucky I heard it hit the ground or I would have lost it. Not sure what else to use the spot for so now I just leave them empty. Aside from that, good wallet.

评论概述: pretty good for the price, works great for my daughter
评论详情: So far so good! My daughter is using it and it works well. I can't say she's abusive, but also not super careful with it and it's fine. She likes it, it fits in her pockets and carries the minimal things she needs. It's a win for the price.

My sister is big into minimalism, and wanted a wallet as basic as possible but still capable of holding her essentials. She said that this was one was absolutely perfect for that because it held her two cards, ID, and money while fitting easily in her pocket. Initially, the gold loop stuck out, no doubt the intention, but she said she removed it without any fuss. She also liked that it felt like a quality wallet that should last her a while, one that would also fit discreetly in a clear bag when she needs to go to concerts.

评论概述: Perfect for Pockets and Small Bags
评论详情: This little keyring wallet holds credit/debit cards and IDs on the outside, while cash and change can go into the small zippered section. I was in need of something that would fit into my pockets so I could go both hands free and shoulder-bag free. I like this wallet because in addition to fitting into most of my pockets, it is light enough to hang from the steering column while attached to my car key. The price is comparable for a wallet at most department stores.

It came wrapped in tissue paper inside a sturdy storage box. The pebbled leather is soft but strong. It holds one card in each slot on both sides, and there’s room for cash inside the zipped compartment.  With a separate carabiner, this could safely clip to a set of keys, on a belt loop, or inside a purse. Very impressed with the quality.

A very nice black leather card holder with a very sturdy ring clip on it. The black leather is thick and has a pebbled texture on it so it feels soft. It holds several cards for what I need and the clip ring makes it so it can easily clip onto my key lanyard or my phone hook. It is a quality card holder and nicely made. I like it a lot!

评论概述: Nice Key Fob with Slim Wallet, but . . .
评论详情: . . . I would worry about losing important cards, such as Driver's License, Credit Cards, etc.  The front has diagonal pockets, which are a bit roomier, while the back has several "tighter" pockets.  There is a zippered area, where you could store loose change or bills, but I will keep more important cards zipped securely inside.The nice thing about this wallet is that you will (most likely) notice right away if you drop it, since your keys are attached to it and will fall with a loud "clunk."  Also, you might not notice your wallet missing from your purse for quite some time, but you will notice that your keys are nowhere to be found when you head back to your car!  Having them both attached together (keys and wallet) is convenient!I have only had this item for a few days, so I cannot attest to its durability.  If anything negative were to occur during normal usage, I will update my review.
This is a very slim wallet. It has a good number of pockets. It has a nice zipper pocket and has good amount of expansion. It also has a nice key chain as well.

评论概述: Almost great, but still very good. A bit too tight. Easy to use keyring.
评论详情: The two pockets cut at a diagonal are great and roomy even for a laminated card, but the other pockets are extremely tight and the leather is very stiff. Otherwise the design is good, the color is a rich raspberry and the keyring is easy to open with a carabiner type clasp. I really like this slim wallet and hope it will loosen up quickly. It comes in a black gift box with a small bit of pink tissue. The box was slightly crushed as it came in a bubble envelope.

I bought a small crossbody bag for Spring and Summer.  I love the bag, but there is no room for my wallet.  This compact and flat wallet is PERFECT.  There are plenty of card slots and even a zipper compartment for  bills and change. (Most people don’t carry “money” around anymore, but you never know when you might need a dollar or two.)This wallet really fits my needs! I love it.

This is extremely good quality and I really like the added ring clip so I can attach it to my bag or link my keys to it. It doesn't hold as many cards as I want, but It's nice for when I want to use my smaller crossbody bags.

For some reason this is mistakenly labeled "for women"! It's fine for men or whatever gender you are. The zipper pocket can hold coins, which is nice if you're someone who still pays with cash. This wallet also has more card slots (6) than your average slim wallet (3-4), but it bulks up very unevenly, in a strange triangular shape, if you fill all of them. I took off the key ring. It didn't seem helpful. Overall this wallet is fine but I would not choose this product unless you really want that zipper pocket. If you don't need the coin pouch, you'll be better off with another design.

I was looking for a wallet like this before I found this one and I was really surprised at how slim it is. It looks just like the picture. I like how it has so many pockets to put stuff the side with the name also has some kind of space to put stuff . I’m using the pouch part to carry the change I had in my other wallet. I also did a comparison of my last wallet it has all the same stuff but takes up way less space. Not sure how long it last but I usually use my stuff until it’s completely broken and unusable so I’ll update y’all if it ever starts peeling or something it also has a soft faux leather kinda feel which I don’t mind but just thought I should mention as well. I saw other comment about spacing but I think it depends on how much you carry as you see I only have enough cards to fill the slots and pocket change so it’s perfect for me rn!!

评论概述: Pretty, soft Wallet with ample space
评论详情: It's on the larger side of mini wallet keychains I've had in the past but not too big.  It's got ample card space on both sides with an expandable zipper and quality carabiner attachment to keychain.  I like the Pink color for myself and the feel of the wallet is quite nice.Overall, it's affordable, has quality material and holds enough for most wallet needs.  I'm very pleased with this product.

评论概述: Super cute and larger than expected
评论详情: I have had several card wallets over the years and this one is a little larger than any of them. That is great for me becuase I often use it alone as my wallet and this holds a substantial amount and still fits in my pocket. The pink is a very nice Barbie Pink and I love it. It is a little stiff, since it in new and I am hoping it softens up with use. The leather has a nice hand feel and the key ring is great for hooking it to a beltlook or inside my purse.

This credit card holder is smaller than pictured on the ad. It is a tiny credit card holder and coin purse to use for when you have a tiny purse for an evening out. It will hold the bare minimum so it would not be my choice for an every day wallet. It looks well made. Not much can go into the zippered center. It is very small.

评论概述: Lightweight, slim (maybe too slim), and lower-grade real leather
评论详情: It does appear to be real leather - not a high grade of any kind (nor did I expect that for the price). It will likely last a few years. It looks just like the picture. I bought it to replace one that is smaller - this was enough bigger that I thought it would work better. But, it doesn't.  What it needs is to be just a dash thicker. The two sides are sewn directly together, but if you fill all the slots, there isn't really enough room for it to fit all that, so it seems tight and stuffed. I wish that the bottom of it had maybe a 1/4" width to it. That would make it perfect.  I will still use it, of course. I'll also keep my eye out for one that has a bit of width to it.
This wallet is lightweight and keeps money and cards within reach. Also fashionable!

评论概述: well made, but the design doesn't inspire me
评论详情: I liked the way this looked when I ordered it.  I carry id + 7 cards.  By the time I had found pockets for evertyhing I had a triangular bulging wallet that wasn't comfortable in a woman's pocket.  Think I'll try something else.

评论概述: Compact women's wallet and card holder
评论详情: The slim wallet has plenty of space to hold your credit cards and IDs.  There are 4 card slots on one side, and each can hold 2 cards with no problem.  There are pockets on either side which can hold other flat cards such as thinner paper insurance cards and the like.  The pockets are lined with smooth fabric, allowing the cards to slide out easily.There is a spring clasp ring to keep your keys.  The top compartment is zippered and can hold cash or other thicker items with an expansion seam at the end.  The zipper works smoothly and is polished metal.  The leather is good quality and soft with a delicate grain texture to it.  The wallet it well stitched and durable, and is a versatile, compact way to carry every day necessities.

These pretty pink wallet is nice and thin do it doesn’t take up much room in my purse which was my objective. I like the slates on both sides of the wallets to organize your cards. The ring on the wallet is a nice touch in case you want to attach it to something. I will enjoy using it. Good fine!

评论概述: Luxury Leather Sleek Wallet! LOVE iT!
评论详情: I absolutely LOVE the HIMODA wallet in hot pink! I've been looking for a wallet to replace my wristlet wallet for some time now. Since, I use a small crossbody purse, I wanted to get a small functional wallet. HIMODA wallet came elegantly packaged in a nice gift box and wrapping paper. It looks expensive, but it's a fraction of the designer brands. It is genuine textured leather. It feels luxurious to the touch. There are 2 pockets at front for driver's license and most used credit card. Zippered middle pouch for cash and change. On the back, there are 4 credit card slots and a horizontal slot for credit card or cash. There's the option to remove the key chain loop. I'll keep the key loop on because it makes the mini wallet easy to locate in my purse. The wallet looks exactly like the advertised photos. I am so happy with this choice! I love the hot pink color and how functional it is. Not to mention, it's a fraction of what a designer wallet cost.

评论概述: A Bit Large to Fit in a Woman's Pocket
评论详情: I don't like carrying a handbag and was looking for a replacement for my worn wallet. This one looked to fit the bill, but it's a bit large to fit in a woman's jean's pocket. The hoop is removeable and a nice addition if you want to secure the wallet in a handbag. I removed it as it provided an easy way for thieves to pull the wallet out of my pocket.  It seems well put together, with the slots providing enough tension to keep single cards in without making it too difficult to pull them out. The ID side is oddly designed and would have been better with additional slots like the reverse side.  Overall it's a decent product, but there are other cheaper items that are designed better and of equal quality.
Soft leather card holder with large enough space for each card so it's not a tight fit. Would recommend 👌
